imdb.plot outline: Season 2, Episode 4: Finding Felicity. Steve heads to the border for a visit with Jacques Andre-Istel, mayor of Felicity and creator of the Museum of History in Granite. He crosses over to Yuma to the Colorado River waterfront and a trip to the Yuma Swapmeet.
imdb.title: Southwest Stories with Steve Brown
akas: Southwest Stories with Steve Brown (United States)
plot: Season 2, Episode 4: Finding Felicity. Steve heads to the border for a visit with Jacques Andre-Istel, mayor of Felicity and creator of the Museum of History in Granite. He crosses over to Yuma to the Colorado River waterfront and a trip to the Yuma Swapmeet.::Steve Brown

Season 2, Episode 1: Little Petroglyph Canyon. Steve leads a tour to visit the living ghost town of Randsburg and leads the group in a 19th century singalong, then to Ridgecrest for BBQ at Casey's, and a trip to the incredible Little Petroglyph Canyon.::Steve Brown
